price: C’est Allah qui a fait descendre le Livre en toute vérité, ainsi que la balance. Et qu’en sais-tu ? Peut-être que l’Heure est proche ?
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۗ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī anzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wal-mīzāna wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata qarībun
